attributes.action: People who are innocent of a crime should have their details removed from the Police National Computer (PNC) and Police National Database (PND)
attributes.additional_details:
The government needs to revise how the details of people who were found to be innocent or were never proven guilty of a crime are kept on Police databases for.

Our Justice system is one of innocent until proven guilty however as things stand a person needs to have an 'exceptional' reason to be able to get their details wiped of the PNC and PND. A new system needs to be put in place that also looks after the interests of the innocent as well as victims of crime.
